title: BRIEF-Allegiant Plans Year-Round Aircraft Base In Destin-Fort Walton Beach
text: 28 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Allegiant Plans Year-Round Aircraft Base In Destin-Fort Walton Beach Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - Allegiant Travel Co: * ALLEGIANT PLANS YEAR-ROUND AIRCRAFT BASE IN DESTIN-FORT WALTON BEACH, NEW JOBS AND FIVE NEW ROUTES * SAYS ‍INVESTING MORE THAN $49 MILLION TO ESTABLISH A YEAR-ROUND BASE OF OPERATIONS, WHICH WILL HOUSE TWO AIRBUS AIRCRAFT​ * SAYS ‍ALSO ANNOUNCED NEW SERVICE TO FIVE CITIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
